relation: For the money, it's an amazing education that is well worth it.
Great cafe and located near a wonderful shopping plaza.
Challenging classes, but with teachers that are always ready to help.
Don't underestimate it. Be prepared to work hard. Fight for the classes you really want, because if you want it more than the others, the opportunities to get the classes are there.
A great learning environment. Fun, exciting teachers who want to do their jobs and a challenging environment which pushes students to do their best. A beautiful campus, too.
pageTitle: Irvine Valley College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Great community college for future transferring student looking to go into a 4 year university. Bang for the buck Going to IVC is really affordable attending the college is a benefit to your pockets. Did enjoy being here The IVC campus is great lots of exciting people there to meet many great teachers to teach and many books to be opened and read. Class rooms are enormous. Did learn a lot Starting my freshman year at IVC was nerve wreck never the less enjoyed my experience the school provided learned more in a few weeks and a pace that was comfortable but at the same time enlightened. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jonathan from Irvine, CA 05/28/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 56 Categories Comments Campus Safety
